title: Man, monsters and mysteries
creator_credit: Les Clark, Ken Peterson and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Discusses how humans invented monsters through fear and ignorance and how science attempts to unravel these mysteries. Looks at the history of the Loch Ness Monster. Partly animated. Suitable for primary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Les Clark, Ken Peterson and Walt Disney Productions
description: Discusses how humans invented monsters through fear and ignorance and how science attempts to unravel these mysteries. Looks at the history of the Loch Ness Monster. Partly animated. Suitable for primary level.
